text: ara smarana karo! Allah nabidera madhyame angikara karechilena -- ''nihsandeha ami tomadera kitaba o jnana bhandara theke pradana karechi, tarapara tomadera kache ekajana rasula asabena tomadera kache ya ache ta pratipadana kareca tomara niscaya'i tamra prati imana anabe ara niscaya tamke sahayya karabe.’’ Tini balechilena -- ''tomara ki sbikara karale o e'i byapare amara sarta grahana karale?’’ Tara balechila -- ''amara sbikara karalama.’’ Tini balalena -- ''tabe tomara saksi theko, ara ami'o tomadera sathe saksyadatadera an'yatama.’’
